palette.title: Two Thousand Hearts
palette.description: Salutations lovely lunatics, Today I have double the reasons to celebrate - two years spent in your wonderful company and two thousand beautiful human beings who have graciously followed me. It is customary when one makes a milestone palette to say a few heartfelt words of gratitude. However right now I find that, despite a heart which is overflowing with love for you all, I simply do not have the words to describe just how much I treasure this place and completely adore each and every one of you. Thank you all for filling my world with joy. Colour on my friends! Love and hugs, Luna:)
